trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Menifee
There was one other sighting in Menifee on or around August 5th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the 5th of agust 2011 will working in my garage I stoped yo have a cigeratte wnet out front looked up and about a mile in front of me is this light so I keep looking at it thinking it was a plain then it changed courses abruptly so I went to get my wife so she ould veryfi what I was seeing wasnt just my mind playing tricks on me she came out loooked at and got scared so I pulled my cell phone out to take a picutre an d my phone went dead so I went in the house to get my veido camera and it went dead so I found an old sony camera that still worked and was able to take several picture's and some viedo. I observed the object for about 8 minutes then it took off.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: I was working in my gararge went out front to have a smoke and looked up and saw abright light wnet to get my wife.
